materials.raw_text:
1. Phosphorus Pentoxide (P4O10) - 50 grams 
 2. Vanadium Pentoxide (V2O5) - 25 grams 
 3. Tungsten Trioxide (WO3) - 25 grams 
 4. Distilled Water - 100 grams

sourcing.instructions:
1. Phosphorus Pentoxide (P4O10) - Available from chemical supply companies or online retailers. 
 2. Vanadium Pentoxide (V2O5) - Can be sourced from specialty chemical suppliers. 
 3. Tungsten Trioxide (WO3) - Obtainable from metal and mineral suppliers. 
 4. Distilled Water - Available at grocery stores or pharmacies.

preparation.raw_text:
1. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, combine 50 grams of Phosphorus Pentoxide and 25 grams of Vanadium Pentoxide. 
 2. Gradually add 25 grams of Tungsten Trioxide while stirring continuously to ensure uniform mixing. 
 3. Slowly incorporate 100 grams of distilled water into the dry mixture, stirring until a homogeneous paste forms.
